high_descs: Turn around and move to the arm chair across the room on your left.
Pick up the credit card from the seat cushion.
Move a few feet to the couch on your left.
Put the credit card in the middle of the right couch cushion near the edge.
anns.task_desc: Move a credit card to the couch.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the chair on the left.
Pick up the blue credit card to the left of the pillow on the chair.
Turn around and walk to the couch on the right.
Put the blue credit card on the edge of the right cushion in the middle on the couch.
anns.task_desc: Place a credit card on a couch.

high_descs: pick up credit card from chair
